description:
* Based on the manga by http://anidb.net/cr1101 [Oogure Ito].
The first-years http://anidb.net/ch10294 [Nagi Souichirou] and http://anidb.net/ch10244 [Bob Makihara] entered Tendou High School with the intent of taking it over — only for Souichirou to get soundly defeated by http://anidb.net/ch7498 [Natsume Maya], the sexy captain of the Jyukenbo martial arts club, who can change her body at will to that of her child-self. Souichirou is further humiliated in his complete loss against Maya`s subordinate, http://anidb.net/ch10243 [Takayanagi Masataka]. Things get more complicated as Maya`s little sister, http://anidb.net/ch8162 [Aya], asks the girl-shy Souichirou to marry her, and tells him to promise never to lose another fight...
A day or so after their violent debut at Tendou High School, which turns out to be a martial arts centred institution, the Enforcers, the school discipline team, moves in to punish the upstart freshmen.
It does not take long before Souichirou and Bob realize their weakness in comparison to Maya, Masataka, and the Enforcers, and join the Jyukenbo with the promise of becoming stronger than any of the current members, within three months.
Aya, in conflict with the Enforcers, whose president is Masataka`s older brother, welcomes them in hopes of Souichiro finally realizing her goal...

REGULAR.description:
In order to find the strongest possible opponents, Souichiro Nagi and Bob Makihara have taken over high schools all across Japan, and Todo Academy is next on the list! But this school isn`t like the others...
Source: crunchyroll

Masataka teaches Souichiro the difference in their strength by beating it into him. Then, the Executive Council begins to mobilize in order to punish "Knuckle Bomb" for starting trouble on school grounds.
Source: crunchyroll

The Executive Council has decreed that Souichiro and Bob`s punishment will have no limits. In the flaming aftermath of Ryuzaki`s "execution", Souichiro and Bob come to realize the bounds of their strength.
Source: crunchyroll

Souichiro and Bob want payback, but know they aren`t good enough to get it... yet. They`re determined to get stronger within three months, and the Juken Club`s going to help them get there, starting with a training camp.
Source: crunchyroll

The Juken Club members take a break from training by going to a bowling alley. Unwittingly, they stumble into the Executive Council`s trap, and the ambush aims to crush the threat of the Juken once and for all!
Source: crunchyroll

The wrestling powerhouse Saga Mask, the staff-wielding samurai Tagami, the assassin Isuzu, and some one hundred men all confront the separated Juken. Will their attempt to divide and conquer succeed?
Source: crunchyroll

The fighting continues. Maya demonstrates her immense skill, while Souichiro shows the results of his training with the Juken. Aya fights Tagami as Masataka and Bob clean up the rest of the Executive Council.
Source: crunchyroll

The boss of the Executive Council, President Mitsuomi, reveals himself to Masataka and Bob, and the results are bloody. Meanwhile, Aya`s own fight demonstrates the power of her Dragon`s Eye.
Source: crunchyroll

The Juken Club reunites, but half of them are on the floor with Mitsuomi standing over them. Souichiro`s true abilities emerge, revealing that this conflict is rooted in what happened in the past.
Source: crunchyroll

Maya begins the tale of how everything began, when she and Mitsuomi were mere freshmen. Back then, her older brother Shin was the president of the Executive Council, but already tensions were brewing.
Source: crunchyroll

The KATANA-hunting is getting out of control, and the team members are out for blood. Meanwhile, Mitsuomi witnesses the startling truth of Shin`s nature, and gets a glimpse of what the elder Natsume is really like.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Celui qui a des Capacités Anormales

REGULAR.description:
Shin descends further into darkness, betraying even people once thought friends. As Mitsuomi struggles with the terror he feels in himself, Bunshichi instead turns to rage.
Source: crunchyroll

Bunshichi takes a wild ride to find Shin. Once the two meet, there`s no choice but to settle things the old-fashioned way. But is Bunshichi really able to take down a monster? Because that`s what Shin is.
Source: crunchyroll

"Exorcist Tawara" finds the limits of Shin`s abilities, and of the man himself. Meanwhile Shin`s motivations are laid bare, and Maya struggles with her conflicting emotions regarding her older brother.
Source: crunchyroll

With Shin in the hospital and most of the team gone, Team KATANA is no more. But all the cards are finally on the table, and the former members must now come to grips with the aftermath.
Source: crunchyroll

Maya cuts the story short, leaving the present-day Juken Club to ponder over what they`ve been told. Knowing the truth doesn`t deter Souichiro and Bob from getting their revenge, however, and they`ve got a lot more training to do!
Source: crunchyroll

In order to overturn Maya`s expulsion, the Juken Club takes the fight to the Executive Council. But Bunshichi has more "friendly advice" to give, and Nagi lets the truth in his heart come out--too bad Aya overhears it.
Source: crunchyroll

Despite being warned, Aya`s personal struggles lead her to take the Chokutou Reiki, her brother`s sword. Mitsuomi and Maya scramble to find her, hoping to avoid the mistakes of the past.
Source: crunchyroll

With the story unfinished, Bunshichi picks up where Maya left off. With Team KATANA gone, Shin starts the Juken Club, and searches for new members. Mitsuomi tries to recruit Maya, and in the process, their relationship grows deeper.
Source: crunchyroll

The Preliminaries have begun! But even as the action heats up, the machinations of the Takayanagi clan continue behind the scenes. For an ultimate warrior to be produced, there must be an ultimate evil...
Source: crunchyroll

With a fully awakened Dragon`s Eye, Shin is terror incarnate. Mitsuomi rushes to put a stop to Shin`s rampage, but when the two of them clash, nothing will be the same.
Source: crunchyroll

A special team has formed to take down the Juken, made up of Todo`s top contenders. Most of Juken is already out, but Mitsuomi demonstrates how much he`s changed since his fight with Shin.
Source: crunchyroll

The animosity between Shin and Mitsuomi reaches its peak. The two of them have one final match to decide everything. No one realized then just how final it would be.
Source: crunchyroll

Bunshichi finishes the story, and now, with Aya still in possession of the Chokutou Reiki, Mitsuomi`s reasons for hunting her down are clear. The Juken Club rallies to fight against Mitsuomi, with Souichirou leading the charge.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: เหนือฟ้า ใต้ภิภพ ข้าเจ๋งสุด!
